content: During the quarter PCS catastrophic losses added 19 percentage points to the loss ratio, driven largely by winter weather across the U.S. Technology and development expenses increased to 14.7 million from 6.9 million in the prior year quarter, primarily driven by an increase in stock based compensation of 4.8 million. To summarize, for the full-year 2022, we continue to expect TGP in the range of 800 million to 820 million, revenue in the range of 140 million to 142 million, and gross loss ratio below 100% and on track for further materials improvement in future years.
